answer_html: \(\displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 5\cdot5^{6} \equiv 5\cdot(25)^{3} \equiv 5\cdot4^{3} \equiv 5\cdot 64 \equiv 5 \cdot(-12) \equiv -60 \equiv 16 \not\equiv 1 \mod{19}\)and so 7 is not the order of 5.
answer_latex: $\displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 5\cdot5^{6} \equiv 5\cdot(25)^{3} \equiv 5\cdot4^{3} \equiv 5\cdot 64 \equiv 5 \cdot(-12) \equiv -60 \equiv 16 \not\equiv 1 \mod{19}$and so 7 is not the order of 5.
hints_html:
Translating the question, the question is asking whether

\(\displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 1 \mod{19}\)

and if 7 is the smallest such number.
hints_latex:
Translating the question, the question is asking whether

$\displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 1 \mod{19}$

and if \emph{7} is the smallest such number.
hints_raw:
Translating the question, the question is asking whether

<math> \displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 1 \mod{19} </math>

and if ''7'' is the smallest such number.
question: 2 (b)
sols_html:
We compute directly

\(\displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 5\cdot5^{6} \equiv 5\cdot(25)^{3} \equiv 5\cdot4^{3} \equiv 5\cdot 64 \equiv 5 \cdot(-12) \equiv -60 \equiv 16 \not\equiv 1 \mod{19}\)

and so 7 is not the order of 5.

We compute directly

\(\displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 5\cdot5^{6} \equiv 5\cdot(25)^{3} \equiv 5\cdot4^{3} \equiv (5\cdot 4)\cdot 4^2 \equiv 20\cdot 16 \equiv 1 \cdot 16 \not\equiv 1 \mod{19}\)

and so 7 is not the order of 5.
sols_latex:
We compute directly

$\displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 5\cdot5^{6} \equiv 5\cdot(25)^{3} \equiv 5\cdot4^{3} \equiv 5\cdot 64 \equiv 5 \cdot(-12) \equiv -60 \equiv 16 \not\equiv 1 \mod{19}$

and so 7 is not the order of 5.

We compute directly

$\displaystyle 5^{7} \equiv 5\cdot5^{6} \equiv 5\cdot(25)^{3} \equiv 5\cdot4^{3} \equiv (5\cdot 4)\cdot 4^2 \equiv 20\cdot 16 \equiv 1 \cdot 16 \not\equiv 1 \mod{19}$

and so 7 is not the order of 5.
sols_raw:
We compute directly

<math> \displaystyle 
5^{7} \equiv 5\cdot5^{6} \equiv 5\cdot(25)^{3} \equiv 5\cdot4^{3} \equiv 5\cdot 64 \equiv 5 \cdot(-12) \equiv -60 \equiv 16 \not\equiv 1 \mod{19}
</math>

and so 7 is not the order of 5.
We compute directly

<math> \displaystyle 
5^{7} \equiv 5\cdot5^{6} \equiv 5\cdot(25)^{3} \equiv 5\cdot4^{3} \equiv (5\cdot 4)\cdot 4^2 \equiv 20\cdot 16 \equiv 1 \cdot 16 \not\equiv 1 \mod{19}
</math>

and so 7 is not the order of 5.
statement_html:
State whether the following are true or false with full justification. Each question carries 4 marks.

The order \(\displaystyle \text{ord}_{19}(5)\) is 7.
statement_raw:
'''State whether the following are true or false with full justification. Each question carries 4 marks.'''
